body.name: GLAMFIELDS Travel Bottles for Toiletries TSA Approved, 3oz Size Leak Proof Silicone Travel Containers for Shampoo, Lotion,Easy to Squeeze Portable, Essentials for Traveling (4 Pack) Purple
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 10 hrs 59 mins
features: 【Leak-proof Essentials】GLAMFIELDS travel toiletry bottles are designed with a three-layer leak-proof system and no-drip valve, ensuring no leakage or overflow in transit. Ideal for keeping your luggage and clothes safe and organized during your travels.

【TSA Approved Portable Travel Bottles】 These 3oz travel size bottles are TSA approved, perfect for carrying shampoo, conditioner, lotion, and all kinds of liquid .Comes with a high-quality transparent wash bag, making your long-distance travels hassle-free.GLAMFIELDS travel size bottles are must have traveling accessories.

【Reusable and Eco-friendly】Made from food-grade silicone, travel toiletry bottles are safe, durable,reusable and flexible. The silicone liquid bottles are soft and easy to squeeze out the contents. An eco-friendly choice that contributes to the environment.

【Easy to Fill and Clean】The wide mouth of the travel bottle makes it easy to fill with your favorite toiletries and easy to clean for secondary reuse.Our TSA approved travel bottles come with label stickers and a quart plastic bag.

【Satisfaction Guaranteed】We are confident that you'll love our travel-sized toiletries set. However, if there is any problem with the purchased product within one year, Glamfields will provide a free replacement. Don't miss out on this must-have travel companion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great Toiletry Containers for Travel GLAMFIELDS is committed to making travel a little easier. These refillable travel bottles set for toiletries are Portable, Safe, Practical, and Convenient. Designed with a 3-layer flip top to prevent leaks and always keep your gear safe and tidy.The clear toiletry bag with zipper makes the bottles easily to organize, and the labels can avoid confusion. The travel kit will make you have a enjoyable journey! Whether you are going on a cruise, business trip, or overnight stay with friends and family, you can always use these travel-size bottles to take your own shampoo, conditioner, lotion, face wash, etc.; which will significantly improve your travel experience, don’t worry about how to carry your toiletries anymore.

Leak Proof Travel Bottles for Toiletries Designed with a 3-layer flip top & no-drip valve,effectively prevents leaks and always keeps your gear safe and tidy. The included PVC bag can nicely keep them together when you aren't using the bottles. Recommended to fill 3/4 of the capacity. Wide Opening to refill and clean GLAMFIELDS wide opening travel bottles make it easy to fill various liquids and also makes it easy for brushes to clean the inside of the silicone bottles. Soft & Squeezable Silicone Material These travel toiletry bottles are made from soft, rugged silicone which is easy to squeeze and gets every last drop out. They are soft and pliable so less chance of breakage in the suitcase, making it perfect for travel and long-term use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome and so easy to fill! I love the colors and quality! They even come with labels so you can label the bottles! Love these!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bottles for travel!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for traveling on my trip to Los Angeles recently. They worked great as the size works for TSA limits and unlike other plastic bottles, these silicone ones, you can pretty much squeeze most of the liquids/creams out. It also comes with a really nice pouch which I couldn't really use since when flying all the liquids needs to be in a gallon bag. A nice addition is the stickers it comes with so you can tell whats in the bottles. I created my own with my label maker, but they are a nice addition regardless! Definitely recommend if you travel a lot. They look easy to clean too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bottles for traveling.
reviews.reviewText: Love these sturdy and eye pleasing tsa bottles for our travels. Recommend them highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel pouches
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these for my recent trip, and these worked out great. The product came with stickers, but the different colored bottles itself is good to identify the product inside by color coding.. the cap is well sealed and didn’t leak as I was worried about, the extra bag it came in helped organize it well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice silicone bottles
reviews.reviewText: These are silicone bottles rather than plastic, with different colors and stickers. You can use the stickers to identify which bottle for what. I have filled 2 bottles and let them sit there for a few days and I haven't seen any leaks. Hopefully they won't leak after an airplane flight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the perfect size! They fit great in my travel bag and hold enough product for over a week to. I appreciate the different colors to keep everything separate and the lables too.Not the easiest to clean out conditioner or lotion. Too a couple good washes to get them cleaned out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these bottles. They come with different labels so you can personalize which has what in it. That is perfect for us because for linger trips I fill 2 with shampoo 1 conditioner and 1 body lotion.I actually bought 2 sets because we also take aloe vera, and body wash.I use one bottle for Avocado oil for our sweet potatoes when we dine out. These bottles really secure whatever products you put in them. They have a wide fill mouth and a squeeze function to get the product out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my daughter for christmas. She loved them. Easy storage and great for traveling. I would buy these again.
